meanings.definition: The act of deleting characters by pressing the backspace key on a keyboard.
meanings.sent1: I fixed my mistake by backspacing on the keyboard.
meanings.sent2: Backspacing is useful when you need to correct errors in your writing.
meanings.sent3: The backspacing on my keyboard seems to have a mind of its own!
meanings.sent4: Her backspacing on the keyboard was like erasing a trail of breadcrumbs.
meanings.sent5: The sound of backspacing echoed through the quiet room.

meanings.definition: Moving backwards through a document or text by deleting characters.
meanings.sent1: She was backspacing to correct a typo in her essay.
meanings.sent2: Backspacing through the code helped him find the error.
meanings.sent3: He kept backspacing so much, he ended up at the beginning of the document!
meanings.sent4: Backspacing through the story felt like rewinding time.
meanings.sent5: The writer's fingers flew over the keyboard, backspacing with precision.
